title: I am not a fan of the remake of 'IT'. I loved the old one much more!
review: Sorry, I just don't like the Remake of 'It'. It mixed with so many unnecessarily zombie like character, I felt like I was watching 'Silent Hill' or 'Grudge' etc..It was a mess. a teenage girl Beverly jumped into the lake with bra and underwear...what was it about? The kids were staring at her body...
